mapper.select: select `id`,`doctor_title_number`,`doctor_title_name`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_doctor_title where id = #{value} and del_flag = '0'

select `id`,`doctor_title_number`,`doctor_title_name`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_doctor_title where doctor_title_name = #{value} and del_flag = '0'

select `id`,`doctor_title_number`,`doctor_title_name`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_doctor_title where doctor_title_number = #{value} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual
insert into base_doctor_title ( `id`, `doctor_title_number`, `doctor_title_name`, `order_weight`, `create_user`, `create_time`, `update_user`, `update_time`, `delete_user`, `delete_time`, `del_flag` ) values ( #{id}, #{doctorTitleNumber}, #{doctorTitleName}, #{orderWeight}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteUser}, #{deleteTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.delete:
delete from base_doctor_title where id in
#{id}
